Name: Scribbleman Army
About the game: Do you like watching tons of units working for you? Scribbleman Army is a colony management game where you have to explore a cave. Collect resources with just a few clicks. Craft units with your resources, they will help you collect, craft and fight. Create new buildings and level up them to unlock new units and new crafts. Upgrade your units to be more productive and more powerful. Prepare for the battle if you want to go down to the next level. You have learnt that your childhood friend has disappeared while trying to explore a new cave. Your duty is to go inside these huge undergrounds and find him! To do so, you will have to be clever, organized and careful. This cave isn't like the others...
